name: Masseffect.vim
body:
### Description

masseffect.vim is a light colorscheme for Vim. It aims to provide a simple and readbable editing environment while you're coding. The colors are based on John Shepard's white armor.

![Shepard](http://blog.thefluxcapacitor.net/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/shep-john.jpg)
tagline: A vim colorscheme inspired by Mass Effect 2
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
